title: Fragment Of Upholstery Trimming, ca. 1830
medium:
Medium: silk and wool
Technique: plain compound twill on silk damask
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description:
b/: Red wool functional weft and red silk warp form a loose twill - over this a repeat, in extra yellow silk seft, of palmette between two leaves - two of these narrow bands have been sewed as borders to red silk damask.
[one of a pair]

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment Of Upholstery Trimming, ca. 1830.
ca. 1830. Medium: silk and wool
Technique: plain compound twill on silk damask. Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1920-19-59-b.
